about_the_game:
Chapter One: The Enigma of the Root Mountains


Nowhere: Mysterious Artifacts Set in September 1993, the first episode begins with four friends heading into uncharted territory, searching for a mysterious artifact. It doesn’t take long to realize something is wrong, as this is the site of the Root Experiment, famed for its stories of those who enter and never return. There is no other option but to survive, and not be afraid of the impossible…

Survival is all that matters




Explore a hostile environment, build a shelter, and survive in a place unknown to man. Make your life here easier by improving your living conditions, upgrading your shelters, and protecting yourself and your friends against the dangers that lie ahead. Don’t forget your sanity and your health, however, as it is all that keeps you alive...

Discover-Loot-Craft


You are in a world full of secrets. Everything around you contains traces of the past. You can wander through these areas and learn recipes that will allow you to craft new items. Discover unique places in Root Mountains which is all of these places has so many unique Items!

Seamless Weather Conditions that alter the way you play



Our game’s unique weather variations give players the chance to create their own dynamic stories of survival. Gain an advantage in challenging conditions, choose when to head out and how the weather might affect your journey. The Day and Night cycle plays an integral part in the game too, with the environments, enemies, and strange anomalies all affected by this system.

Solo and Coop



In Nowhere, you can explore and survive as a lone wolf, or team up and experience the whole adventure in co-op, with up to 3 of your friends!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6500 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 / Radeon RX 6600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Prefably Using SSD or M2 Storage for Faster Loading and Better smooth performances
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700K / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 / Radeon RX 6700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Prefably Using SSD or M2 Storage for Faster Loading and Better smooth performances

short_description: Nowhere: Mysterious Artifacts is a Multiplayer Survival Horror game for up to 4 players. Set in the Middle of the Unknown, you can craft, build, explore and discover secrets in the exciting first chapter from EFNSOFT.

English*, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian
